Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (91.67%) toMyxinidinActivity: active against E-coli ATCC 11219 (MIC >50 uM), P-aeruginosa ATCC 13388 (MIC >50 uM), S-enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC >50 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC 10031 (MIC 30 uM), S. aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC 5 uM).Toxicity: human RBC (5%), 22% hemolysis at 200 uM (HC50> 200 uM, low hemo.lytic).Structure: helical in 50% TFE.
Literature Information.Author: Cantisani M, Finamore E, Mignogna E, Falanga A, Nicoletti GF, Pedone C, Morelli G, Leone M, Galdiero M, Galdiero S.2014
Literature Information.Title: Structural insights into and activity analysis of the antimicrobial peptide myxinidin.
